name: MCP Server Builder
summary: Guides creation of Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers to enable LLM integration with external services through well-designed tools and resources
when_to_use: User wants to build MCP servers
User needs to integrate external APIs with LLMs via MCP
User wants to create MCP tools and resources
User needs MCP protocol implementation guidance
User wants to expose services to Claude or other LLMs
when_not_to_use: User needs general API development (use backend-development)
User wants LLM application without MCP (use llm-application-dev)
User wants to use existing MCP servers (not build new ones)
